page.title: 08HEELANDS MEETING PLACE
page.content: _In Heelands there is a meeting place on some evenings there is a youth club.It is 25p to join and in there they sell sweets and drinks.They have snooker and pool tables and table tennis and lots of other things. Sometimes they have discos in there and it is open to all the public.When you go you sometimes play hockey, football or rounders when the weathers bad you play musical statues or pass the parcel or something else.On the sign outside there is a picture of two hands crossing and a picture of two people.In the day when wen are at school there is a play group which is for toddlers about 2-5 years of age and is for parents to take their children when they're at work,doing the shopping or just because they want to give their children something to do.
